rows.label: qst202910_msg1001
rows.name:
Thanks friends for wondrous offering!
Friends make Sage very happy!

rows.label: qst202910_msg2001
rows.name: And memories all come back too!

rows.label: qst202910_msg3001
rows.name:
Girl who friends looking for did come
here. Ran off towards Pillar City Ruins.

rows.label: qst202910_msg4001
rows.name:
Me not know what girl was looking for,
but quite dangerous by alone. Friends
should go and help girl quick-quick!

rows.label: qst202910_msg4002
rows.name:
Please bring many offering for
tum-tum of Sage.

rows.label: qst202910_msg4004
rows.name:
F-friends do what?! Me not want
to be trapped in cold dark again!

rows.label: qst202910_msg4005
rows.name:
Me try very hard to remember,
so please friends not do that!

rows.label: qst202910_msg4007
rows.name:
Ah yes, hm yes...
Me remember everything!

rows.label: qst202910_msg4010
rows.name:
Such technique have no effect on
Nopon Sage in training!

rows.label: qst202910_msg4012
rows.name:
Instead of waste time tormenting,
friends bring offering quick-quick.

rows.label: qst202910_msg4014
rows.name:
Friends can get Juicy Ray Fin by
defeating Manda Moramora in Invidia.

rows.label: qst202910_msg4015
rows.name:
Benign Cricket, Friends can get in
Liberalitan Archipelago. Soft Sea
Cucumber is a thing in Gula!

rows.label: qst202910_msg4016
rows.name:
Very well! Off friends go to get
offerings!
